name: PIERCED BALACLAVA
description:
This unique balaclava is crafted from a soft, fuzzy knit, featuring metal ring piercings for an edgy look.
Designed with a unisex fit, it offers both style and warmth.
Made from a durable blend of 60% polyamide and 40% acrylic.
Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.

name: BAGZILLA IN BLUSH
description:
This oversized blush bag is perfect for carrying all your essentials. Made from durable t-shirt yarn, it combines functionality with a standout design. Crafted from a blend of 92% polyester and 8% elastane. Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.

name: BALACLAVA IN ROYAL BLUE
description:
This stylish balaclava is crafted from a soft, fuzzy knit for a cozy feel. Designed with a unisex fit, it provides both warmth and a sleek, cool look. Made from a durable blend of 60% polyamide and 40% acrylic. Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.

name: SNOW ANGEL SET
description:
This cozy set includes a soft, faux-fur scarf and matching hand warmers, designed to add a bold, glamorous touch to your look. The fuzzy texture mimics real fur. Made from durable Nylon faux-fur yarn. Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.

name: BOWCLAVA IN BLACK WITH PINK BOWS
description:
The Bowclava in black with pink bows is a standout piece, combining a sleek black design with bold pink accents. Crafted from soft, fuzzy knit, it offers both warmth and style with a cute edge. Designed with a unisex fit, it’s the perfect accessory to make a statement in colder weather. Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.

name: BIGGRIP BAG
description:
This oversized black bag is designed to carry everything you need, offering both practicality and style. With its spacious design and sturdy wooden handle, it’s perfect for any occasion. Made from high-quality macramé cord, 100% polypropylene, ensuring durability and flexibility. Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.

name: SMALL ESSENTIALS BAG WITH INTERCHANGEABLE HANDLES IN GOLD
description:
This sleek, compact bag is perfect for your essentials, featuring a lighter case that holds a lighter, with a carabiner for easy attachment or removal. Versatile in design, it can be worn as a crossover or styled as a small handbag by swapping the handles. Ideal for carrying your phone or smoking supplies in a stylish, functional way. Made from high-quality macramé cord, 100% polypropylene. Made in Germany.

Ships within a week.
